DOC.brief_summary: The overall objective current study determine whether computerized Working Memory ( WM ) train enhance WM capacity college student Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder ( ADHD ) /Learning Disabilities ( LD ) . There also three additional objective . The first determine whether improvement WM generalize secondary outcome task , inhibitory control planning . The second objective examine whether WM training also ameliorate ADHD symptom inattention hyperactivity . The last objective investigate whether improvement maintain two month follow-up period . It expect computerized WM training program enhance WM capacity college student ADHD . In addition , believe increase WM capacity also lead improvement executive function . It also hypothesize WM train lead reduction ADHD symptomology . Lastly , improvement maintain three month follow-up .
DOC.brief_title: Working Memory Training College Students With Attention-Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder/Learning Disabilities
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis ADHD/Learning Disability register university student ( full part time ) register accessibility service take least one course On leave
